[Portrait]Outland Mage
[Dialog]Are you blind to the treason of your
words, Rapha!?{END}

[Portrait]Rapha
[Dialog]Me? It is you who cannot see!

He uses us, Marach! We are instruments
of murder to him, naught more!

To stay would be to live out our days
as the grand duke's cat's-paws, killing
so he might keep his own hands clean!
Come, let us run away together while
we yet can!{END}

[Portrait]Marach
[Dialog]Have you forgotten who it was who saved us
when we had lost our parents to the war?
Grand Duke Barrington opened his heart and
home to the both of us. You would repay
that kindness now with treachery?
We owe him a debt of allegiance. We'd have
died a beggar's death were it not for him!{END}

Feed us he did, Marach, but we were supped
on lies!

I know the truth of it now. It was the grand
duke himself who set fire to our village, his
hand hidden by the smoke of war!
And do you know why-why he killed everyone
we ever knew? It was for our gifts! You and I
possess power, and power is all he craves.
He burnt down our entire village that he might
claim the sacred power of our mantras for his
own!
Opened his heart, you say? The man is not
possessed of one! It is -you- who need open
your -eyes-, Marach!{END}

I'll not abide your ill-mannered tongue!{END}

You know, don't you?


You know of the...the thing he did to me.


You are my brother, you know of this,
and even yet you-{END}

Speak not another word! You stir a rage 
in me, Rapha. I am your brother and your
elder, and I will not have you question me!{END}

[Portrait]Riovanesian Ninja
[Dialog]There you are, Marach. The heretic
<Ramza> draws nigh.{END}

I am well aware, and long
since made prepared.{END}

Marach...{END}

That's him!{END}

Rapha-!{END}

Pray lend me your aid!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]You're the man from Dorter!

Did you not say you'd await

[Portrait]Marach
[Dialog]I did but deliver the grand duke's

I do not need the templarate's swords

[Portrait]Riovanes Ninja
[Dialog]What is the meaning of this,

Has Rapha betrayed us?{END}

[Portrait]Marach
[Dialog]Pay my sister no heed! I will put

The only slaying you need concern

Leave Rapha to me.{END}

But how will you explain her death

Did I not just tell you that is none

Breathe word of any of this to the

[Portrait]<Ramza>

[Portrait]Marach

[Portrait]Rapha
[Dialog]Marach...{END}

[Portrait]Marach
[Dialog]Hmph!{END}

[Portrait]Rapha
